manifest.author: Jason Motylinski
manifest.name: Hierarchical Outgoing Links
manifest.description: Displays outgoing links in a hierarchy

manifest.author: Joshua Tazman Reinier
manifest.name: Time Ruler
manifest.description: A drag-and-drop time ruler combining the best of a task list and a calendar view (integrates with Tasks, Full Calendar, and Dataview).

manifest.author: Alan Grainger
manifest.name: Update modified date
manifest.description: Automatically update a frontmatter modified date field when you modify your note. This will not use the filesystem time, but only when you modify the file through Obsidian. Optionally store a history of edit times.

manifest.author: Daniel Karakka
manifest.name: Paste From History
manifest.description: Paste from the editor's recent clipboard history.

manifest.author: Callum Alpass
manifest.name: BibLib
manifest.description: Create literature notes and manage bibliographic references.

manifest.author: Mario Holubar
manifest.name: Daily note creator
manifest.description: Automatically creates missing daily notes

manifest.author: Michal Srch
manifest.name: Double Colon Conceal
manifest.description: Display double colon (i.e. Dataview inline fields) as a single colon for more natural reading experience.

manifest.author: David Landry
manifest.name: Desk
manifest.description: A desk to see notes at a glance in Obsidian. Requires Dataview as a dependency.

manifest.author: Huajin
manifest.name: File Preview
manifest.description: Add file preview contents under file in file explorer.

manifest.author: Shubham Sethi
manifest.name: Rollover Weekly Todo
manifest.description: Rollover todo items from the previous weekly note.

manifest.author: Evan Moscoso
manifest.name: Smart Connections Visualizer

manifest.author: Jeremy Valentine
manifest.name: Settings Search

manifest.name: Camera

manifest.name: ObsidianTweaks
